notice.author: Philipp Grozinger
notice.title: Formulate v.0.1.2-alpha
notice.text: This update brings the account page with the ability to change the password. Again, this happens through a safely encrypted SQL database. The update also brings the new header bar which greatly improves the appearance of Formulate. There have been additional graphical fixes across all pages, most notably, the addition of the icons on most buttons.
